# Core Rule 1 ## You MUST be 18 or older to join this server. [color=#ff0000][bold]This is non-negotiable, zero tolerance and will result in a permanent ban.[/bold][/color]
You must be 18 years old or older to join this server.
If you are under the age of 18 years old, you will be permanently banned.
If you were under the age of 18 years old when you joined the server, but are now 18 years old or older, you will be permanently banned.
